org.jboss.netty.channel

Interface MessageEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChannelEvent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DownstreamMessageEvent, UpstreamMessageEvent

    public interface MessageEvent
extends ChannelEvent
    A ChannelEvent which represents the transmission or reception of a message. It can mean the notification of a received message or the request for writing a message, depending on whether it is an upstream event or a downstream event respectively. Please refer to the ChannelEvent documentation to find out what an upstream event and a downstream event are and what fundamental differences they have.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object getMessage()
      Returns the message.
      SocketAddress getRemoteAddress()
      Returns the remote address of the message.

        getChannel, getFuture
